definition: a flap that lies over another part, coincide partially or wholly
details:
noun
- a flap that lies over another part
= synonyms: lap
- the property of partial coincidence in time
- a representation of common ground between theories or phenomena
= example: a representation of common ground between theories or phenomena
= synonyms: intersection
verb
- coincide partially or wholly
= example: coincide partially or wholly
- extend over and cover a part of
= example: extend over and cover a part of
